Name: Copy Kitty
About the game: Blast robots in cyberspace! Boki wants to be a hero, but isn't quite there yet. Her uncle Savant built a virtual reality combat program so Boki can practice, and become the superhero she's always wanted to be! Tons of cool weapons! Boki can copy powers from enemies, and then combine up to 3 at a time . Each of the 175 combinations have been hand-crafted to be as cool as possible! A massive level editor! Make your own custom missions - and absolutely everything is customizable. Mix and match enemies with different weapons, and even make your own multi-phase boss battles! Share your levels with friends, or upload them to Steam Workshop. Other stuff: • 13 worlds in story mode, with over 20 bosses total • Hard Mode as a continuation of the main story, with new enemies and cutscenes • Endless Mode with 37 environments, and bosses with randomized attacks • Play as Savant , with completely different abilities and 100 new weapons • A free demo with 5 worlds, the standard path in Endless, and a limited version of the editor
